thread.title: VIDEO: Experience ‘Beauty and the Beast’ in Fantasyland at Disneyland Park
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Experience ‘Beauty and the Beast’ in Fantasyland at Disneyland Park

author: Erin Glover
title: VIDEO: Experience ‘Beauty and the Beast’ in Fantasyland at Disneyland Park
text:
Now in Fantasyland at Disneyland park, you are invited to be our guest and step into the beloved story of “ Beauty and the Beast ” for a limited time! From delicious new food at Red Rose Taverne to surprise character experiences and enchanting merchandise, there is so much to discover. Take a look!

Don’t miss this special, limited-time experience at Disneyland park! Learn more here .
